attributes.action: Consider Peter Gabriel for an honour of some kind in recognition of his services to music and humanity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Gabriel has worked tirelessly on behalf of the troubled peoples of the world. In addition, he has been a musical and technical innovator who has pushed forward change in the music industry in often unrecognised ways. I feel that he should be honoured by the country in recognition of his work.
